tool_description: Parses and validates ownership splits and rights percentages for songs among writers and publishers.

catalog_number.description: Unique catalog identifier for the song

writer_splits.description: Writer ownership percentages as numbers (must sum to 100)

publisher_splits.description: Publisher ownership percentages as numbers (must sum to 100)

effective_date.description: Date when ownership splits became effective

territory.description: Territory code (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2) where splits apply

error_messages: Split percentages do not sum to 100: Writer splits and publisher splits must each total exactly 100%.
Mismatched arrays: writer_names and writer_splits arrays must have the same length; same for publishers.
Invalid percentage values: All split percentages must be between 0.01 and 100.0.
Invalid effective date: Date must be in ISO 8601 format and not in the future.
Invalid territory code: Use valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 codes or 'WW' for worldwide.
usage: Provide catalog_number, matching arrays of names and splits for writers and publishers, effective_date, and optionally territory. Validates that splits sum to 100%.

total_writer_percentage.description: Sum of all writer split percentages

total_publisher_percentage.description: Sum of all publisher split percentages
